segment.source: Use the Select Installer page to specify the installation (.msi, .exe) files or programs for the application that you are sequencing.
segment.target: Use the Select Installer page to specify the installation (.msi, .exe) files or programs for the application that you are sequencing.

segment.source: The files specified on this page must be the actual files that will be used to install the application you are sequencing.
segment.target: The files specified on this page must be the actual files that will be used to install the application you are sequencing.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Select the installer for the application.
segment.target: Select the installer for the application.

segment.source: Specifies the installation file or files that the sequencer runs and records while creating the virtual application package.
segment.target: Specifies the installation file or files that the sequencer runs and records while creating the virtual application package.

segment.source: You must specify a valid Windows Installer or an executable (.exe) program.
segment.target: You must specify a valid Windows Installer or an executable (.exe) program.

segment.source: Select this option to perform a custom installation.
segment.target: Select this option to perform a custom installation.

segment.source: If the application you are installing does not have an associated Windows Installer or executable program, select this option to manually install the application by using a custom set of installation files.
segment.target: If the application you are installing does not have an associated Windows Installer or executable program, select this option to manually install the application by using a custom set of installation files.
